title: Gabriel Mendes
text: Gabriel Azevedo Mendes (born 30 May 1954 in <a href="Miragaia%20%28Porto%29">Miragaia (Porto)</a>), known simply as Gabriel, is a Portuguese retired <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="right%20back%20%28association%20football%29">right back</a> and <a href="manager%20%28association%20football%29">manager</a>.
